content: In a Teflon liner, FeTCPP (6.0 mg), ZrOCl2·8H2O (90 mg), and benzoic acid (840 mg) were dissolved in DMF (50 mL) and then sonicated for 10 min. Subsequently, the Teflon liner was heated at 80 °C for 5 h. The product was washed with DMF and ethanol. Finally, the obtained PMOF­(Fe) was redispersed in ethanol.
clean_text:
Preparation of PMOF(Fe)

In a Teflon liner, FeTCPP (6.0 mg), ZrOCl2⋅8H2O (90 mg), and benzoic acid (840 mg) were dissolved in DMF (50 mL) and then sonicated for 10 min. Subsequently, the Teflon liner was heated at 80 °C for 5 h. The product was washed with DMF and ethanol. Finally, the obtained PMOF(Fe) was redispersed in ethanol.
